key.name: current-layout-id
key.description: The ID of the currently active window layout layout.

key.name: current-zone-index
key.description: The index of the currently active zone within the current layout (0-based).

key.name: cycle-zone-left
key.description: Move the focused window to the previous zone in the current layout.

key.name: cycle-zone-right
key.description: Move the focused window to the next zone in the current layout.

key.name: show-layout-picker
key.description: Display the layout selection dialog.

key.name: quick-layout-shortcuts-enabled
key.description: When enabled, registers global shortcuts (Super+Ctrl+Alt+1-9) to quickly switch layouts. When disabled, number keys 1-9 still work within the layout picker dialog.

key.name: enhanced-window-management-enabled
key.description: When enabled, adds Windows-like minimize/maximize shortcuts (Super+Down/Up). Super+Down minimizes a window; pressing again restores it. Super+Up restores a minimized window, or toggles maximize on normal windows.

key.name: minimize-window
key.description: Minimize the focused window. If pressed again while the same window is minimized, restore it. Requires enhanced-window-management-enabled.

key.name: maximize-window
key.description: If a window was minimized with Super+Down, restore it. Otherwise, toggle between maximized and floating state. Requires enhanced-window-management-enabled.

key.name: layout-picker-size
key.description: Size of the layout picker dialog as a fraction of screen size (0.3-0.9). Default is 0.8 (80%).

key.name: layout-order
key.description: Array of layout IDs in custom display order. Empty array means use natural order.

key.name: show-panel-indicator
key.description: Show the Zoned icon in the top bar panel. When disabled, all functionality remains accessible via keyboard shortcuts, the layout switcher, and the Extensions app settings.

key.name: ui-theme
key.description: Color scheme for extension UI dialogs. Options: 'system' (follows GNOME color-scheme), 'light' (force light mode), 'dark' (force dark mode). Default is 'system'.

key.name: use-per-workspace-layouts
key.description: When enabled, each workspace can have its own layout. When disabled, the layout applies globally to all workspaces.

key.name: workspace-layout-map
spatial-state-map
last-selected-layout
key.description: Used as default for unconfigured spaces when per-space mode enabled. Also serves as fallback when a saved layout is deleted.

key.name: quick-layout-1
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "1" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-2
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "2" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-3
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "3" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-4
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "4" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-5
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "5" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-6
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "6" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-7
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "7" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-8
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "8" assigned in its settings.

key.name: quick-layout-9
key.description: Activate the layout that has shortcut "9" assigned in its settings.

key.name: debug-layout-rects
key.description: When enabled, shows colored debug borders around all layout elements in the layout switcher dialog to help visualize layout issues. Red=container, Blue=section, Green=row, Yellow=card, Magenta=spacer.

key.name: debug-layout-overlay
key.description: When enabled, shows a debug overlay with calculated dimensions, tier information, and validation results for layout debugging.

key.name: option-force-tier
key.description: Override automatic tier selection for testing. 0=auto (default), 1=tiny, 2=small, 3=medium, 4=large, 5=xlarge. Use Ctrl+T in layout switcher to cycle through tiers.

key.name: keybinding-conflict-count
key.description: Used for signaling between preferences and extension when conflicts change. Updated by prefs.js after any shortcut change, watched by extension to update panel icon.

key.name: prefs-scroll-target
key.description: When set, preferences window will scroll to and highlight this section on open. Values: "keyboard-shortcuts", "enhanced-shortcuts", or empty string. Reset to empty after use.

key.name: prefs-close-requested
key.description: When set to true by extension, preferences window should close itself. Used when panel menu fixes conflicts while prefs is open. Prefs resets this to false after closing.

key.name: notifications-enabled
key.description: Master toggle for all Zoned notifications. When disabled, no notifications will be shown for any action.

key.name: notification-duration
key.description: How long notifications stay visible before auto-dismissing. Default is 1000ms (1 second). Range: 500ms to 5000ms.

key.name: center-notification-size
key.description: Size of the center-screen notification overlay. Options: "small" (256px), "medium" (384px), "large" (512px).

key.name: center-notification-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the center notification background (50-100%). Default is 85%.

key.name: center-notification-preview
key.description: Internal flag used to trigger a preview notification from preferences. When set to true, extension shows a sample notification and resets to false.

key.name: notify-window-snapping
key.description: Notification style for zone cycling (Super+Left/Right). Options: "center" (large center-screen), "system" (top-bar), "disabled".

key.name: notify-layout-switching
key.description: Notification style for layout/profile changes via picker, menu, or shortcuts. Options: "center" (large center-screen), "system" (top-bar), "disabled".

key.name: notify-window-management
key.description: Notification style for minimize/maximize/restore actions. Options: "center" (large center-screen), "system" (top-bar), "disabled".

key.name: notify-workspace-changes
key.description: Notification style for per-space layout display when switching workspaces. Options: "center" (large center-screen), "system" (top-bar), "disabled".

key.name: notify-startup
key.description: Notification style for extension startup messages. Options: "center" (large center-screen), "system" (top-bar), "disabled".

key.name: notify-conflicts
key.description: Notification style for keybinding conflict detection. Options: "center" (large center-screen), "system" (top-bar), "disabled".

key.name: debug-logging
key.description: Enables info/debug level console output for troubleshooting. Errors and warnings are always logged regardless of this setting. View logs with: journalctl -f /usr/bin/gnome-shell

key.name: developer-mode-revealed
key.description: Internal flag tracking whether the hidden Developer section is visible. Toggle with Ctrl+Shift+D in the preferences window. Reset via the "Reset Debug Settings" button.
